enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying the composite map structure, making it beneficial to test them together to ensure consistent state.
The remove method complements the put method by removing a key-value pair that might have been added by put, ensuring comprehensive state coverage.
The remove method should be tested after ensuring the key exists in the map, which can be verified using containsKey.
After removing a key, the get method can be used to verify that the key is no longer retrievable, ensuring the remove operation was successful.
